item.title: PaperCut NG

item.title: Pega Platform
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://docs.pega.com/security-advisory/security-advisory-apache-log4j-zero-day-vulnerability Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Fix NCSC-NL Hotfixes made available for registered customers by Pega.
